titles.title: Honoring the life of Dr. Ronald W. Walters and commending his life as an example to future generations of the people of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Expresses condolences to the family of Dr. Ronald W. Walters (professor, civil rights scholar, and activist) and honors his lifelong dedication to freedom and democracy.
